SECTION1_SUBTITLE1: Travel in time with Asteria Kremlin Palace
SECTION1_TEXT1: Asteria Kremlin Palace was built inspired by Kremlin Palace in Moscow to give you a chance to feel the magnificent atmosphere and discover the home of the Russian Czars. The hotel is located in one of the most modern resorts of Antalya â€“ Kundu.
SECTION1_TEXT2: Kundu attracts tourists not only with close location to Antalya city center but also with the beauty of the golden beaches and relaxing atmosphere
